network

Class Scheduler<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Scheduler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type of message.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FIFOScheduler, VOQScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler<T extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the abstract functionality of a scheduler, and provides support for a decision structure.

    The scheduler must provide addMessageToSchedule(int, Node, DeferredSchedulingNode, Message), scheduleNode(int, DeferredSchedulingNode), and initializeTag(DeferredSchedulingNode).

    Author:
    Bitidork
    See Also:
    DeferredSchedulingNode

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Scheduler.DecisionStructure
      Contains the structure necessary to determine where to send messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scheduler()
      Constructs a Scheduler with domain over an empty collection of nodes.

      Adds message arriving at node from source at time to be scheduled when possible by this scheduler.

      Adds the supplied node to this scheduler and initializes the tag and decision structures of that node.

      Gets the next node in the flow to carry the message along its destination.

      Gets a copy of the collection of nodes this scheduler has domain over.

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageToSchedule

        public abstract void addMessageToSchedule(int time,
                        Node<T> source,
                        DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node,
                        T message)
        Adds message arriving at node from source at time to be scheduled when possible by this scheduler. If node generated the message, source and node will be equal.
        Parameters:
        time - The time the message arrived at node.
        source - The node the message just came from.
        node - The node the message arrived at.
        message - The message to be scheduled.
        See Also:
        scheduleNode(int, DeferredSchedulingNode)

      • scheduleNode

        public abstract void scheduleNode(int time,
                DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node)
        Schedules the supplied node at the given time, and transmits over its output links in this way.
        Parameters:
        time - The time to start scheduling.
        node - The node to schedule.

      • addNode

        public final void addNode(DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node)
        Adds the supplied node to this scheduler and initializes the tag and decision structures of that node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to add under the domain of this scheduler.

      • getNodes

        public java.util.Set<DeferredSchedulingNode<T>> getNodes()
        Gets a copy of the collection of nodes this scheduler has domain over.
        Returns:
        Returns a copy of the collection of nodes this scheduler has domain over.

      • getNextHop

        public Node<T> getNextHop(DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node,
                 T message)
        Gets the next node in the flow to carry the message along its destination.
        Parameters:
        node - A node.
        message - A message.
        Returns:
        Returns the next node in the flow to carry the message along its destination.

      • putDecision

        public void putDecision(DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node,
               Node<T> source,
               Node<T> destination,
               Node<T> nextHop)
        Sets the next node in the flow from source to destination at node to be nextHop.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to put the decision at.
        source - The source of the flow.
        destination - The destination of the flow.
        nextHop - The next node messages should arrive at.
